com.blukii.sdk.discovery

Interface BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BlukiiClient

    public static interface BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener
    Callbacks for the BLE discovery.

    Discovery callbacks are registered by calling BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener).

    See Also:
    BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener), BlukiiClient.startDiscovery(), BlukiiClient.stopDiscovery()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDiscoveryResult(java.util.List<DiscoveryData> discoveryResultList)
      Will be called frequently after one scan duration for returning the scan results.
      void onError(BlukiiDiscoveryError error)
      Will be called if discovery fails because of an error
      void onInfo(BlukiiDiscoveryInfo info)
      Will be called for discovery state information

    • Method Detail

      • onDiscoveryResult

        void onDiscoveryResult(java.util.List<DiscoveryData> discoveryResultList)
        Will be called frequently after one scan duration for returning the scan results.

        If no BLE modules has been found discoveryResultList is an empty list (not null).

        If the discovery failed because of an error onDiscoveryResult will not be called.

        Parameters:
        discoveryResultList - list of discovered DiscoveryData
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener), DiscoverySettings

      • onError

        void onError(BlukiiDiscoveryError error)
        Will be called if discovery fails because of an error
        Parameters:
        error - error code
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener)

      • onInfo

        void onInfo(BlukiiDiscoveryInfo info)
        Will be called for discovery state information
        Parameters:
        info - info code
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener)
